attributes.action: Make all Care Homes part of the NHS. Pay Staff a proper wage and abolish Fees.
attributes.additional_details: Care for the Elderly should not be a profit making machine for private companies. The staff are poorly paid, and they and their patients are not properly protected. Care Homes have been moaning that they have no PPE. Why did they not have it? They should have already had it to protect against outbreaks of D&V or other infections. No one should have to pay for their care. The NHS should be there from cradle to grave.
attributes.background: Take all care homes into state ownership. Stop the scandal of people losing their life savings in a few months to line the pockets of wealthy individuals.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions instead:

We would like the government to consider social care as equally important to NHS: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302897

Revoke the Health and Social Care Act 2012 and renationalise the NHS: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300019

Increase NHS and Social Care staff pay by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317721

Make full sick pay for carers a licensing requirement for care homes: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320974
